ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Benchmarks?
ygData.msgSnippet: Here are some nice 3D graphs of test functions for a GA toolkit. There are some very simple shapes and some more complex, now image a network were each output

Here are some nice 3D graphs of test functions for a GA toolkit. There 
are some very simple shapes and some more complex, now image a network 
were each output node described one of these functions (assuming x,y 
inputs)  - how complex would a network need to be to describe these?

http://www.systemtechnik.tu-ilmenau.de/~pohlheim/GA_Toolbox/fcnindex.html 
<http://www.systemtechnik.tu-ilmenau.de/%7Epohlheim/GA_Toolbox/fcnindex.html>
